/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of a clear day. The sky, a serene canvas of blue, is lightly brushed with wisps of white clouds. The sun, though unseen, makes its presence known through the bright light that illuminates the scene.

On either side of the street, tall buildings stretch towards the sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. They stand as silent sentinels, witnesses to the city's constant motion. Parked cars, mostly in shades of white and gray, line the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sun's rays. A few red and blue cars add splashes of color to the otherwise monochrome palette.

The street itself is a hive of activity. Several people can be seen going about their day, their paths crisscrossing as they navigate the urban maze. Bicycles, parked haphazardly, hint at the preferred mode of transport in this city.

The image is taken from a high vantage point, offering a bird's eye view of the scene. This perspective allows for a comprehensive view of the street, the buildings, and the people, providing a glimpse into the rhythm of city life.
